authFirebase.initialText: This is a Single Page Application (SPA) made with Angular 8.
authFirebase.initialItem1: Uses external API's  to get some information like the weather, cryptocurrency...
authFirebase.initialItem2: Uses REDUX pattern to communicate all the components witch each other.
authFirebase.initialItem3: Styles made with Bootstrap y FontAwesome.
authFirebase.accessWithoutRegistrationText1: begins been a portfolio project to show how works the Pattern REDUX into a huge Web App with Angular.

authFirebase.text1IA: PersonalIA is an example about how to implementade Pattern REDUX in Angular, this SPA has been created focused in this part.
